data: monitor urine ketones twice a day (morning and evening)
PRN, If blood glucose at or below 2.2 mmol/L or if signs of hypoglycemia remeasure blood glucose in 30 minutes
If blood glucose at or below 2.2 mmol/L or if signs of hypoglycemia, then administer the following
Refer to Ketogenic Management: Physician Guideline
Refer to Management and Monitoring of Inpatient Ketogenic Diets
Review the most current diet order for therapeutic requirements, food texture and fluid thickness. Add anything to be carried forward to the new Diet Order
Consultation with dietitian is required. On weekends page on-call dietitian
Ketogenic Diet, Bulk Food Delivery + Formula
Ketogenic Diet, Bulk Food Delivery Only
T;N, Food only, Consultation with dietitian is required. On weekends page on-call dietitian
T;N, Food PLUS Recipe-Based Formula, Consultation with dietitian is required. On weekends page on-call dietitian
T;N, Recipe-Based Formula Only, Consultation with dietitian is required. On weekends page on-call dietitian
T;N Family Prepared w/Formula Rm Ingredients
NPO after midnight. May have carbohydrate free (ketogenic friendly) fluids (as per BCCH Fasting Guidelines) until 2 hours before procedure

All weighing of food and/or formula ingredients to be done on a laboratory scale accurate to 0.1 grams (Note: diaper scales are not accurate to 0.1 gram and cannot be used). If families own scale is not available contact the T6 charge nurse
Choose sodium chloride 0.9% or sodium chloride 0.45% IV fluids unless treating hypoglycemia
40 mL, IV, as directed, PRN hypoglycemia, administer over 30 minute, drug form: bag
No chewable tablets or liquid suspensions while on ketogenic diet
1 g/kg, PO, qdaily, drug form: powder [Less than 5 kg]
1 g/kg, NG-tube, qdaily, drug form: oral liq [Less Than 5 kg]
5 g, PO, qdaily, drug form: powder [5-8 kg]
5 g, NG-tube, qdaily, drug form: powder [5-8 kg]
8 g, PO, qdaily, drug form: powder [8-10 kg]
8 g, NG-tube, qdaily, drug form: powder [8-10 kg]
12.5 g, PO, qdaily, drug form: powder [10-15 kg]
12.5 g, NG-tube, qdaily, drug form: powder [10-15 kg]
17 g, PO, qdaily, drug form: powder [Greater Than or Equal to 15 kg]
17 g, NG-tube, qdaily, drug form: powder [Greater Than or Equal to 15 kg]
1 g/kg, PO, qdaily, PRN constipation, drug form: powder [Less than 5 kg]
1 g/kg, NG-tube, qdaily, PRN constipation,  drug form: oral liq [Less Than 5 kg]
5 g, PO, qdaily, PRN constipation, drug form: powder [5-8 kg]
5 g, NG-tube, qdaily, PRN constipation, drug form: powder [5-8 kg]
8 g, PO, qdaily, PRN constipation, drug form: powder [8-10 kg]
8 g, NG-tube, qdaily, PRN constipation, drug form: powder [8-10 kg]
12.5 g, PO, qdaily, PRN constipation, drug form: powder [10-15 kg]
12.5 g, NG-tube, qdaily, PRN constipation, drug form: powder [10-15 kg]
17 g, PO, qdaily, PRN constipation, drug form: powder [Greater Than or Equal to 15 kg]
17 g, NG-tube, qdaily, PRN constipation, drug form: powder [Greater Than or Equal to 15 kg]
If vomiting or diarrhea persist longer than 24 hours, order diluted pedialyte
